property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: A U.S. service member speaking to a Pakistan Army soldier

note.text: In official settings, interactions are very structured. Pakistanis are briefed extensively on what they can offer and won't stray from these standpoints until you've developed a personal relationship with them.

However, in one-on-one conversations during breaks, especially after several meetings, your counterparts may be more candid and open. If you speak with them privately, they may be more likely to express their personal opinions.
